page.title: 11OLD CHURCH
page.content: At Broughton Green there is a church. On the side of the building there is a bell.The church is a very small one.It may have been used as a school at one time because there seemed to be a little playground on the side.It is now used occasionally for a church service.There were toilets out the side of the church. These were all over_grown with nettles.There seemed to be a little well which could of been used as kind of water fountain for the school .Inside the church there were some kneelers and chairs and tables.
